metadata.title: CVE-2023-1295 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - high
metadata.description:
A time-of-check to time-of-use issue exists in io_uring subsystem'sIORING_OP_CLOSE operation in the Linux kernel's versions 5.6 - 5.11(inclusive), which allows a local user to elevate their privileges to root.Introduced in b5dba59e0cf7e2cc4d3b3b1ac5fe81ddf21959eb, patched in9eac1904d3364254d622bf2c771c4f85cd435fc2, backported to stable in788d0824269bef539fe31a785b1517882eafed93.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-1295` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-1119-fips - 4.15.0-1119.130
linux-image-hmac-4.15.0-1119-fips - 4.15.0-1119.130
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1119-fips - 4.15.0-1119.130
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-4.15.0-1119-fips - 4.15.0-1119.130
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-2103-aws-fips - 4.15.0-2103.109
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-4.15.0-2103-aws-fips - 4.15.0-2103.109
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-2082-azure-fips - 4.15.0-2082.88
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-4.15.0-2082-azure-fips - 4.15.0-2082.88
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-2066-gcp-fips - 4.15.0-2066.71
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-4.15.0-2066-gcp-fips - 4.15.0-2066.71
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
